dict.string: You don't have enough material units.
Units in your favorites can't be used as awakening material.
Units currently in your party can't be used as awakening material.
The material unit doesn't have enough Bugs to proceed with awakening.
Get hold of material in quest: %s

<font color="red">Includes units with limit break</font>
When awakening a unit, units used as material will disappear Continue?
<font color="red"> Units with unlocked Potentials are included. Deep-Log will be lost.</font>
<font color="red">Includes unit with mod attached to material unit. Mods are converted automatically. Continue?</font>
<font color="red">Includes unit with released mod slot</font>
Currently in use for Enigma Quest, cannot be Awakened.
Currently in use for Enigma Quest, cannot be EX Evolved.

About Awakening Units You can awaken units after leveling them up to maximum. After awakening, you can strengthen your units further.
We prepared the Awakening Material for you this time. Try to awaken this unit.
You can check here for <font color='yellow'>Bits</font> and <font color='yellow'>Material</font> to awaken units.
Now, try to awaken an unit.

Awakening is successful <font color='yellow'> Skill </font> and <font color='yellow'> Ability </font> has changed.
Units will become level 1 after being awakened. Strengthen your unit by boosting up unit's level and make it even powerful.

Now you can challenge the Unit Awakening tutorial quest. Try to challenge?
If you skip the tutorial, the units given in the tutorial will be sent directly to your folder.
